text: José Nicholas Théodore (born September 13, 1976) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey goaltender. He played parts of eighteen seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the Montreal Canadiens, Colorado Avalanche, Washington Capitals, Minnesota Wild, and Florida Panthers. He also played for Djurgårdens IF of the Swedish Hockey League (SEL). During his career in the NHL, Théodore won the Vezina and Hart trophies in 2001, as well as, the Bill Masterton Memorial Trophy in 2010. He would retire from playing professional ice hockey in 2013. After retiring, Théodore became an analyst for TVA Sports and wrote a hockey column for Le Journal de Montréal newspaper. ==Awards== * Vezina Trophy (2002) * Hart Memorial Trophy (2002) * Bill Masterton Memorial Trophy (2010) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Bill Masterton Memorial Trophy winners Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Colorado Avalanche players Category:Florida Panthers players Category:Fredericton Canadiens players Category:Hart Memorial Trophy winners Category:Hull Olympiques players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Lake Erie Monsters players Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Quebec Citadelles players Category:Saint-Jean Lynx players Category:Swedish Hockey League players Category:Vezina Trophy winners Category:Washington Capitals players
title: José Théodore
